content:
Approved ProjectsEnter Your Mobile No.Calculate and enter captchaSend OTPValidate OTPPlease enter the OTP (one time password) to verify your account. A Code has been sent to *******VerifyNot received your code?Resend codeNameMobile No.Email IdProperty LocationI provide my consent for ICICI Bank representativeto contactDisclaimer :I provide my consent to representatives from ICICI Bank Limited to reach out to me through my registered e-mail, phone, SMS or WhatsApp messaging in reference to my query on Home Loan for listed builder projects.RegisterHomeArea ConverterApply Home LoanRequest a CallbackNameEmailIdMob No.SubmitHomeArea ConverterPreviousNextSearch for your dream homein your preferred localityTop SearchesShow MoreCheck AllUncheck AllAllABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ175View All Localities(106)Search  Project NowIntroductionCalculate Home Loan EligibilityApply Home LoanCalculate Home Loan EMIHome Buyers GuideExplore Builder Projects Approved for Home LoanAt ICICI Bank, we understand that buying a home is a significant decision and securing the right funding is just as crucial. That's why we are here to support you in finding your dream home. As you log in, you can explore vast database of residential projects approved for Home Loan across key cities in India.Once you've chosen your dream home, you can check your Home Loan eligibility and apply for an online sanction followed by quick disbursement.1We have got all your needs covered in one place!Residential projectapproved for Home LoanProjects ataccessible locationsMultiple configurationsof residential unitsOnline Home Loan sanction2with minimal documentationQuickdisbursement1Nilforeclosure charges3Onlinepost-disbursement services.ICICI Bank is truly your one-stop solution for all your home-buying needs.Search Projects1Subject to document submission and applicable terms2Subject to provisional approvals3Applicable on floating rate of interest only.Instantly check ICICI Bank Home Loan EligibilityYour dream home is now within your reach with ICICI Bank Home Loans. We offer higher loan amount on your income. Your home loan eligibility can be further enhanced by including income of the co-applicant(s) of your Home Loan.Home Loan eligibility is calculated after considering various factors including monthly income, fixed monthly obligation, current age, retirement age etc. Your home loan eligibility can also be considered an indicator of your home loan affordability.Use ICICI Bank Home Loan Eligibility Calculator to calculate the amount that you can borrow.Eligibility calculatorApply Home LoanICICI Bank Home Loan EMI CalculatorCalculate the EMIs on your home loanInterested in availing a home loan, but unsure of the EMIs that you need to pay? Don’t worry, the home loan EMI calculator from ICICI Bank is just what you need. Using our online calculator, input the loan amount, the rate of interest and the loan tenure. The calculator will then display the EMI amount you will need to pay each month. It’s that simple!Home Buyers GuideThe Home Buyers Guide is a tailored resource crafted specially for first time home buyers like you. It is designed to ease the process of purchasing your dream home. It offers informative infographics, insightful blogs and practical calculators, all aimed at simplifying your home buying journey.Our guide covers essential topics for first-time buyers, assists in selecting your dream home, provides funding options and offers solutions on transferring your existing Home Loan or availing a Top-Up Loan on your existing Home Loan. By providing these essential tools, we aim to empower you with the knowledge and resources necessary to make informed decisions and realise your homeownership aspirations.Click to visit Home Buyers GuideFrequently Asked QuestionsExpand AllClose AllWhat is the difference between carpet area, built-up and super built-up area?The area of an apartment or building, not inclusive of the area of the walls is known as carpet area. This is the area that is actually used and in which a carpet can be laid.
When the area of the walls including the balcony is calculated along with the carpet area, it is known as built-up area. The built-up area along with the area under common spaces like lobby, lifts, stairs, garden and swimming pool is called super built-up area.What is meant by valuation of property?The valuation process evaluates the market value of the property. Demand and supply forces operating in the market, as well as other factors like type of property, quality of construction, its location, the local infrastructure available, maintenance, are all taken into consideration before the market value is decided.How can I register my property?Registration of a property includes necessary stamping and paying of registration charges for a sale deed/Agreement for sale and getting it recorded at the sub-registrar's office of the concerned jurisdictional area.How do I apply for a Home Loan?You can apply for ICICI Bank Home Loan through our website www.icicibank.com or visit the nearest ICICI Bank branchWhat is Pre-EMI?Under the Pre-Equated Monthly Instalment (EMI) option, the borrower is required to pay only the interest on the loan amount that will be disbursed as per the progress on construction of the project. The actual EMI payment starts after the possession of the house.What is an EMI?EMI or Equated Monthly Instalment is a fixed amount paid by you to the bank on a specific date every month. The EMIs are fixed when you borrow money from the bank as a loan. EMIs are used to pay both interest and principal amount of a loan in a way that over a specific number of years, the loan amount is repaid to the bank with interest.I have a flat which I want to sell and buy a new flat, bigger in area. What are my tax implications with regards to capital gains?Capital Gains are exempt if a person purchases a new flat within two years of the date of sale of the original flat and invests the entire amount of capital gained into the new flat. However, the same is subject to the provisions of the Income Tax Act, 1961. Customers are requested to consult his/her Chartered Accountant in this regard.Recommended BlogsHow To Choose The Right Home Loan In India?Getting the best deal on a Home Loan can be as tricky as choosing the home itself. With so many lenders offering many different types of loan products, selection can be challenging for homebuyers. This post lists five critical factors you must consider for choosing the best deal.KNOW MOREBuying a Home or Renting a House - What is Better for You?The age-old dilemma of selecting between renting or purchasing a home continues to haunt buyers in India. Does renting a home make more financial sense as compared to buying? This post gives an objective perspective.KNOW MORERight strategy to pay off the Home Loan fasterHome Loan is a long-term liability and it is generally a big-ticket size amount that stretches for 15 - 25 years. If you are looking to pay it faster, here are some strategies that you can implement.KNOW MORE5 different types of Home Loans in IndiaWith the rising real estate prices in India, a Home Loan is the only way through which most people fulfil their dream of buying a home. To better meet the needs of the borrowers, lenders in India now offer different types of Home Loans.KNOW MOREProjects Approved by ICICI Bank Home Loans:One of the key competitive advantages of ICICI Bank Home Loans is our large database
                    of approved projects. Choose your dream home with ICICI Bank Home Loans from our
                    approved projects across40 citiesand let us make
                    your dream come true.Eligibility calculatorHome loan EMI calculatorT&Cs.#Subject to document submission and applicable terms*Subject to provisional approvals**Applicable on floating rate of interest only.Disclaimer:You are now accessinghttps://home.icicibank.comwhich is a third party website provided by PE Analytics Ltd. (PropEquity). ICICI Bank Ltd or P.E Analytics Ltd or their Affiliates / group companies do not undertake any liability or 
                    responsibility for the Information contained herein. The information provided in this website does not constitute investment advice or an offer to sell, or 
                    a solicitation of an offer to purchase or subscribe for any real estate investment. Loan applications for the listed projects shall be accepted at 
                    the sole discretion of ICICI Bank and ICICI Bank shall not be bound, in any manner, whatsoever, to approve any application.Please note that, we are currently in the process of updating our website to comply with the requirements under the Real Estate (Regulation and Development) Act, 2016 (“RERA”) and display the information relevant to a particular Property/Project for general information purpose, including Property/project details, listings, floor area, location, maps etc.The Website is not owned or controlled by ICICI Bank Ltd and ICICI Bank shall not be held responsible/liable for the accuracy and/or completeness of the information. The User should undertake the necessary due diligence prior to finalizing any transactions..CloseModal title...CloseSave changesClose

residential property for the first Home LoanResale Property FundingA loan is available for resale propertiesThings you should knowTenure LimitMaximum tenure is 20 years.Initial RepaymentPay only interest for the first 3-5 years.Secondary TenureEMI includes principal and interest after the primary term.Income RequirementThe minimum salary required is Rs. 30,000 per month.Things you’ll needto applySalaried from select firmsIdentity ProofAddress ProofDOB ProofIncome ProofVIEW DETAILED DOCUMENTATIONHow to apply!Meet the loan representative at the nearest ICICI Bank BranchConfirm eligibilitySubmit required documentsGet Sanction letterLooking for something else?ProductsTop-Up LoansAvail additional funds on your existing Mortgage LoanHome LoansApply for a Home Loan online with instant provisional sanction and minimal documentationAbout Step Up Home LoansWhat is a Step Up Home Loan?ICICI Bank Step Up Home Loans comes with enhanced eligibility for salaried individual to buy their dream home. You can take Home Loan with easy EMIs in the initial years, which keeps on increasing as your income grows.How are repayments structured?There are two phases for repayment, one during the primary term, which is around 3-5 years when you need to only pay the interest component for your Home Loan. In the secondary term, your EMI constitutes the principal as well as the interest component.Can I apply for this loan if I have an existing Home Loan?No, the Step Up Repayment Facility is available only for new loans or balance transfers. If you have an existing Home Loan, you cannot apply for this loan.What is the maximum loan amount I can get?You can borrow up to ₹ 3 crore under the Step Up Home Loan facility, subject to your income and property value.FAQsWho is eligible for Step Up Home Loans?This loan is available to salaried professionals earning a minimum of ₹ 30,000 per month and employed with select corporates identified by ICICI Bank.How does this loan offer higher eligibility?The Step Up Repayment Facility considers your future income growth, allowing you to take up a loan amount up to 20% higher than standard Home Loan eligibility.Can this loan be used for resale properties?Yes, Step Up Home Loans can be taken for both new properties and resale transactions.   For resale properties or builder purchase completed properties, the primary loan repayment tenure is capped at 3 years.What happens if I want to make part payments?During the second tenure, you can opt for part payments after beginning EMI. This decreases your principal amount, bringing down your interest payments on the whole.Can I avail of this loan for under-construction properties?Yes, the loan is available for under-construction properties, builder purchases, and resale properties, offering flexibility in choosing your dream home.BlogsBlogsgoto previous cardgoto next cardgoto previous cardgoto next cardCloseclose disclaimer modalDisclaimerSTAY ON THIS SITEPROCEED

Additional documents may be required for a case-to-case basis.VIEW DETAILED DOCUMENTATIONHow to Apply for Home Loan in few stepsEnter your detailsCheck your eligibilityPay the processing feeUpload DocumentsGet Provisional SanctionAPPLY NOWLooking for something else?Instant Home LoanInstant sanction with special processing fees.Instant Balance TransferInstant sanction with minimal documentation.About Home loansUnderstanding a Home LoanA Home Loan is a financial product that helps individuals purchase, build or renovate their homes. It provides funds based on the property value and the applicant’s eligibility. The Loan is typically repaid in easy monthly instalments (EMIs) over a long tenure.Benefits of a Home LoanHome Loans offer significant advantages, such as attractive interest rates, tax benefits under Section 80C and the ability to own a property without full upfront payment. They provide flexible repayment options, making it easier to manage finances. With a Home Loan, buying a home becomes more affordable and feasible.Are Home Loans a good option to buy property?Home Loans make it easier to invest in real estate, allowing individuals to purchase their dream home without having to save for and pay the entire price upfront. With attractive interest rates and long repayment periods, Home Loans ensure that buying a home is more accessible, affordable and financially manageable.Home Loan FAQsWhat is a home loan?A Home Loan provides funds for purchasing, constructing or renovating a property, which is repaid in monthly instalments over time (known as EMIs).How do I apply for a home loan?You can apply via the iMobile app, Internet Banking, the ICICI Bank website or by visiting any ICICI Bank Branch..What factors affect Home Loan eligibility?Eligibility is based on age (20–65 years for salaried individuals, 21–70 years for self-employed individuals), income, employment stability and credit score (ideally 750+) of the applicant.Take a word from our CustomersPPeddintli Rao Dodda4.5I want to express my sincere appreciation for the Relationship Manager who assisted me with my Home Loan application. His follow-up and guidance was instrumental in making the loan process fast and efficient. It took less than two days for the sanction. The disbursement was quick, covering the legal and technical aspects which is not possible with other banks. Thank you for such dedicated support and exceptional service.AAbhishek Gupta5I availed Home Loan from ICICI Bank and I will highly recommend it. The application process was simple, documentation requirements were clear and the Bank's team was responsive and professional. The loan approval and disbursal were on time and the transparency of the terms and conditions was commendable. Overall, I had a hassle-free and satisfying experience with ICICI Bank Home Loan team. I am grateful for the support and assistance I have received from the dedicated team of ICICI Bank. I am looking forward to a long and trusted relationship with ICICI Bank.SSuraj Srivastava4.5ICICI Bank and its Relationship Manager made my Home Loan process as simple as it could be. It just took 3 weeks right from the first enquiry call to the loan disbursement. Hats off to the team for their prompt actions, timely reminders for documents, closure of tasks etc. I will share my wonderful experience with others and strongly recommend ICICI Bank Home Loan to everyone. Thanks team.close disclaimer modalDisclaimerSTAY ON THIS SITEPROCEED

feeUpload the required documentsGet provisional approvalAPPLY NOWLooking for something else?Tab 1Tab 2PurchasingLandFinance your land purchase with Land LoansCommercialPropertyGet tailored property loan solutions to achieve your business goalsHome ImprovementLoanFund your home renovations with our flexible loan optionsAbout Loan Against Property (LAP)Types of Loan Against PropertyICICI Bank offers customised Loan Against Property options, including loans against residential, commercial and industrial properties.Customised LAP SolutionsWe offer Loans Against Property with competitive interest rates, ensuring financial flexibility.Hassle-Free Loan ProcessWe prioritise customer convenience with a simplified application process, quick approvals and complete transparency, making borrowing easy and efficient.Extensive Network of ICICI BankWith a strong presence across India and robust digital banking platforms, ICICI Bank ensures seamless support and accessibility for all customers.Loan Against Property FAQsWhat is a Loan Against Property (LAP)?Loan Against Property (LAP) is a secured loan where you can pledge your residential, commercial or industrial property as collateral to borrow funds. The Loan amount is typically a percentage of the property's market value.Who can take a Loan Against Property (LAP)?Individuals, including salaried professionals, self-employed individuals and business owners, can apply for a Loan Against Property. Eligibility depends on factors such as income, age, property type and credit score.What is the maximum term for which I can take a Loan Against Property (LAP)?You can avail of a Loan Against Property for a maximum tenure of up to 15 years. However, the tenure offered may vary depending on factors such as your repayment capacity, age and the Bank’s policies.What type of property can I mortgage for a Loan Against Property?You can mortgage residential, commercial or industrial properties. The property must be owned by the applicant and should meet ICICI Bank’s eligibility criteria.Does ICICI Bank offer a Property Loan as an overdraft?Yes, ICICI Bank offers an overdraft facility under Loan Against Property, allowing you to withdraw funds as needed and pay interest only on the utilised amount.What percentage of the property value can I avail as a Loan Against Property?You can avail a maximum of up to 75% of the property’s market value as a Loan Against Property, depending on factors such as the property type and your eligibility.BlogsBlogsgoto previous cardgoto next cardgoto previous cardgoto next cardCloseclose disclaimer modalDisclaimerSTAY ON THIS SITEPROCEED

easeInstant Provisional Sanction*Hassle-free DocumentationFast ProcessingLong TenureVIEW INTEREST RATESHome Loan CalculatorsEMIELIGIBILITYAFFORDABILITYBALANCE TRANSFERHome Loan Feature & BenefitsOnline SanctionGet an instant provisional sanction withminimal documentationApply Online for ConvenienceEasily apply for a Home Loan online, with minimal paperwork.Attractive Interest RateBenefit from an attractive interest rate making your Home Loan repayments more manageable.No Foreclosure Charges*Enjoy the flexibility of no foreclosure charges, giving you the freedom to pay off your Loan early.Home Loan Document Required & EligibilityBelow is the list of documents required for a Home LoanIdentity ProofAddress ProofIncome ProofDisclaimer This is an indicative list only. Additional documents may be required for a case-to-case basis.VIEW DETAILED DOCUMENTATIONHow to Apply for Home Loan in few stepsEnter your detailsCheck your eligibilityPay the processing feeUpload DocumentsGet Provisional SanctionAPPLY NOWLooking for something else?Instant Home LoanInstant sanction with special processing fees.Instant Balance TransferInstant sanction with minimal documentation.About Home loansUnderstanding a Home LoanA Home Loan is a financial product that helps individuals purchase, build or renovate their homes. It provides funds based on the property value and the applicant’s eligibility. The Loan is typically repaid in easy monthly instalments (EMIs) over a long tenure.Benefits of a Home LoanHome Loans offer significant advantages, such as attractive interest rates, tax benefits under Section 80C and the ability to own a property without full upfront payment. They provide flexible repayment options, making it easier to manage finances. With a Home Loan, buying a home becomes more affordable and feasible.Are Home Loans a good option to buy property?Home Loans make it easier to invest in real estate, allowing individuals to purchase their dream home without having to save for and pay the entire price upfront. With attractive interest rates and long repayment periods, Home Loans ensure that buying a home is more accessible, affordable and financially manageable.Home Loan FAQsWhat is a home loan?A Home Loan provides funds for purchasing, constructing or renovating a property, which is repaid in monthly instalments over time (known as EMIs).How do I apply for a home loan?You can apply via the iMobile app, Internet Banking, the ICICI Bank website or by visiting any ICICI Bank Branch..What factors affect Home Loan eligibility?Eligibility is based on age (20–65 years for salaried individuals, 21–70 years for self-employed individuals), income, employment stability and credit score (ideally 750+) of the applicant.Take a word from our CustomersPPeddintli Rao Dodda4.5I want to express my sincere appreciation for the Relationship Manager who assisted me with my Home Loan application. His follow-up and guidance was instrumental in making the loan process fast and efficient. It took less than two days for the sanction. The disbursement was quick, covering the legal and technical aspects which is not possible with other banks. Thank you for such dedicated support and exceptional service.AAbhishek Gupta5I availed Home Loan from ICICI Bank and I will highly recommend it. The application process was simple, documentation requirements were clear and the Bank's team was responsive and professional. The loan approval and disbursal were on time and the transparency of the terms and conditions was commendable. Overall, I had a hassle-free and satisfying experience with ICICI Bank Home Loan team. I am grateful for the support and assistance I have received from the dedicated team of ICICI Bank. I am looking forward to a long and trusted relationship with ICICI Bank.SSuraj Srivastava4.5ICICI Bank and its Relationship Manager made my Home Loan process as simple as it could be. It just took 3 weeks right from the first enquiry call to the loan disbursement. Hats off to the team for their prompt actions, timely reminders for documents, closure of tasks etc. I will share my wonderful experience with others and strongly recommend ICICI Bank Home Loan to everyone. Thanks team.close disclaimer modalDisclaimerSTAY ON THIS SITEPROCEED

title: Instant Home Overdraft | ICICI Bank
content: Instant Home Overdraft | ICICI BankLoansHome LoanInstant Home OverdraftInstant Home OverdraftGet quick and easy access to funds with our Overdraft facility on your existing Mortgage Loan. This convenient facility sets up an automatic limit linked to your Savings Account, giving you the flexibility to withdraw funds, as needed. With interest charged only on the amount you withdraw and for the duration used, you can manage your finances efficiently.Our Overdraft facility is perfect for covering life's essential expenses, such as funding your child's education, financing home renovations, debt consolidation or meeting any other emergency needs.GET INSTANT SANCTIONFeatures & Benefits of Instant Home OverdraftInstant Limit set-upFlexibility in end useMinimal DocumentationCustomer Care Number:18001080Email us :customer.care@icicibank.com*T&Cs.Instant Home Overdraft Related FAQsWhat can you use the Instant OD for?You can use Instant OD in multiple scenarios, such as:Home ImprovementFamily WeddingPersonal TravelBusiness ExpansionMedical EmergencyHigher EducationI am an existing ICICI Bank Home Loan customer. Can I take an Overdraft facility?Yes, existing loan customers can take this facility in the form of a Top-up over an existing loan.Blogs and VideosBlogsVideosgoto previous cardgoto next cardgoto previous cardgoto next cardCloseclose disclaimer modalDisclaimerSTAY ON THIS SITEPROCEED

title: Contact Details
content: Contact DetailsLoansHome LoanContact DetailsContact DetailsThe Bank sends updates on Loans to their customers on their registered e-mail ID/ mobile number. The benefits of updating your e-mail ID and mobile number in your Account are:Credit Information Companies (CICs) send alerts through SMS/e-mail, when your Credit Information Report (CIR) is accessedThe Bank sends alerts through SMS/e-mail, while submitting information to Credit Information Companies (CICs) regarding Default/Days Past Due (DPD) in existing credit facilitiesYou will receive other information like the intimation of your EMI due/bounce and other Account related information on the registered e-mail ID/mobile numberAccess your Loan details through ICICI Bank’s iMobile app. To download, SMS iMobile to 5676766.For further information, visit a Loan Servicing Branch. Visit maps.icicibank.com/mobile for a list of Loan Servicing Branches and select Loan Servicing Branch, under ‘Services’.Update your e-mail ID/mobile number byclicking here, by visiting a Loan Servicing Branch or call 1800 1080. Follow the same process to update your mobile number or e-mail ID in the future.close disclaimer modalDisclaimerSTAY ON THIS SITEPROCEED

title: Get Instant Home Loan Approval Online | ICICI Bank
content: Get Instant Home Loan Approval Online | ICICI BankLoansHome LoanInstant Home LoanInstant Home LoanMake your homeownership dream a reality with an ICICI Bank Home Loan. With its online application process and minimal documentation, your dream home is closer than ever. Enjoy the benefit of instant sanction and a special processing fee*.*T&Cs.APPLY NOWFeatures & Benefits of Instant Home LoanInstant SanctionNil foreclosure****Applicable on floating rate of interest onlyMinimal DocumentationVast database of ICICI Bank Approved ProjectsNeed Assistance?Customer Care Number:18001080Email us :customer.care@icicibank.comInstant Home Loan Related FAQsWhat is an Instant Home Loan?Instant Home Loan has an instant sanction for only select customers. To get this, you need to generate aHome Loan sanction letter onlinein just a few clicks. The sanction letter will be valid for a period of 6 months from the date of generation.Is it mandatory to identify a property before generating the sanction letter?You can generate the sanction letter even if a property is not identified. Since the letter has a validity of 6 months, you need to identify a property within this period.I need a higher loan amount than the amount displayed. How do I apply for a higher amount?If you need a higher loan amount, you need to add the income of spouse or other blood relatives which is acceptable as per ICICI Bank (or any other additional sources of income such as rental/agricultural/dividend income). For a loan amount higher than the amount offered, you can apply for the same on Express Home Loan.After getting the instant Home Loan sanction, do I need to submit any documents at the time of disbursement?Yes. You are required to submit the following documents at the time of the disbursement:Property documents of the proposed propertyDisbursement documentation (our executives/branch sales managers will assist you)Any other document as per the conditions mentioned in your sanction letter or as per the property identified.If I reduce the tenure, what will be the effect on the Home Loan amount?If you reduce the existing tenure, your loan amount will get reduced accordingly, so that the overall Equated Monthly Instalment (EMI) remains the same.Blogs and VideosBlogsVideosgoto previous cardgoto next cardgoto previous cardgoto next cardCloseclose disclaimer modalDisclaimerSTAY ON THIS SITEPROCEED

Additional documents may be required for a case-to-case basis.VIEW DETAILED DOCUMENTATIONHow to Apply for Home Loan in few stepsEnter your detailsCheck your eligibilityPay the processing feeUpload DocumentsGet Provisional SanctionAPPLY NOWLooking for something else?Instant Home LoanInstant sanction with special processing fees.Instant Balance TransferInstant sanction with minimal documentation.About Home loansUnderstanding a Home LoanA Home Loan is a financial product that helps individuals purchase, build or renovate their homes. It provides funds based on the property value and the applicant’s eligibility. The Loan is typically repaid in easy monthly instalments (EMIs) over a long tenure.Benefits of a Home LoanHome Loans offer significant advantages, such as attractive interest rates, tax benefits under Section 80C and the ability to own a property without full upfront payment. They provide flexible repayment options, making it easier to manage finances. With a Home Loan, buying a home becomes more affordable and feasible.Are Home Loans a good option to buy property?Home Loans make it easier to invest in real estate, allowing individuals to purchase their dream home without having to save for and pay the entire price upfront. With attractive interest rates and long repayment periods, Home Loans ensure that buying a home is more accessible, affordable and financially manageable.Home Loan FAQsWhat is a home loan?A Home Loan provides funds for purchasing, constructing or renovating a property, which is repaid in monthly instalments over time (known as EMIs).How do I apply for a home loan?You can apply via the iMobile app, Internet Banking, the ICICI Bank website or by visiting any ICICI Bank Branch..What factors affect Home Loan eligibility?Eligibility is based on age (20–65 years for salaried individuals, 21–70 years for self-employed individuals), income, employment stability and credit score (ideally 750+) of the applicant.Take a word from our CustomersPPeddintli Rao Dodda4.5I want to express my sincere appreciation for the Relationship Manager who assisted me with my Home Loan application. His follow-up and guidance was instrumental in making the loan process fast and efficient. It took less than two days for the sanction. The loan approval and disbursal were on time and the transparency of the terms and conditions was commendable. Overall, I had a hassle-free and satisfying experience with ICICI Bank Home Loan team. I am grateful for the support and assistance I have received from the dedicated team of ICICI Bank. I am looking forward to a long and trusted relationship with ICICI Bank.SSuraj Srivastava4.5ICICI Bank and its Relationship Manager made my Home Loan process as simple as it could be. It just took 3 weeks right from the first enquiry call to the loan disbursement. Hats off to the team for their prompt actions, timely reminders for documents, closure of tasks etc. I will share my wonderful experience with others and strongly recommend ICICI Bank Home Loan to everyone. title: Online Banking - Safety Tips for Home Loans - ICICI Bank
content: Online Banking - Safety Tips for Home Loans - ICICI BankHomePersonal BankingProductsSafe bankingLoansHome LoanHome LoanHome loanis a long term commitment. It is wise to exercise prudence and take extra care while going through the processSafety Tips when taking a Home LoanAsk the bank executive you are dealing with for proof of his/her identityKeep all document with attested photocopies readyMake sure you sign every photocopied page before you attach it to your applicationCheck the Most Important Information note before signing loan documentCheck all the filled-in- details with care before finally handing over your application to the bank executiveAvoid giving original documents to the executiveIf you issue any cheque for charges or fees, remember to issue them in favour of your bank,and not any individualAfter submission of the documents if you decide not to avail the loan, inform the bank immediatelyIf you do not receive a reply regarding acceptance or rejection of you loan-application within the time specified, contact the bank through their Customer Care or BranchEnsure that tittle of the property is clearAvoid giving originalKYCdocuments to the executive.Do not ever handover original / copy of property documents to unknown person.DemoLearn more about safe banking tips through interesting videosI-SafeAn application to enhance the security of your online account with OTPCustomer EducationSeriesLearn about Credit Scores, Nomination, Banking Ombudsman and more.RBI AdvisoryRead the RBI advisory against Phishing emails sent in its name.
